12 Feb 2016 • on Ruby on rails

My First Ruby On Rails App

I start my first rudy on rails project by following this tutorial.

Installation

  • Ruby on Rails
  • MySQL (installed by Homebrew)

Make sure the version of your rails (4.2.0+) and ruby (2.2.0+)

Initiation

$ rails new [project name] -d mysql
$ cd [project name]
$ bundle install

Remember to configer your database.yml (Add socket, password, etc.)

Basic commands

To create a new rails controller with action inside:

$ rails generate controller [controller name] [action name]

Ruby tags

<% ruby code%>
<%= ruby with output%>
<%# comments%>
